class.name: PComposite
class.javadoc: PComposite is a simple node that makes a group of nodes appear to be a single node when picking and interacting. There is also partial (commented out) support for resizing the child node to fit when this nodes bounds are set. 1.0 Jesse Grosjean

Return true if this node or any pickable descendants are picked. If a pick occurs the pickPath is modified so that this node is always returned as the picked node, event if it was a descendant node that initially reported the pick.
pickPath the pick path to add the nodes to if they are picked
true if this node or one of its descendants was picked
